title: Go about getting an inactive summoner name
body: To elaborate on what I mean, there's a summoner name I really want and I've checked OCE.op.gg and the account has been inactive since season 5. Is there a way to either contact the person or get riot to release the name? I know my chances probably aren't good, but if anyone knows any way to do this let me know please.

replies.body: Riot releases names from inactive accounts after a certain amount of time (not sure how long, but quite a while). I believe there are some 3rd party sites than can give you an idea of when a name will become available, but they're never 100% accurate.
